name: verifyEmail
description: Re-send Contact E-mail Verification for specified Domain

X-Shopper-Id.description: Shopper for whom domain contact e-mail should be verified. NOTE: This is only required if you are a Reseller managing a domain purchased outside the scope of your reseller account. For instance, if you're a Reseller, but purchased a Domain via http://www.godaddy.com

domain.description: Domain whose Contact E-mail should be verified.
